com.owl.downloader.core.Task

    程序包 说明

    Core components
    com.owl.downloader.event
    Components related to the event system

    • com.owl.downloader.core中Task的使用

      实现Task的com.owl.downloader.core中的类 
      修饰符和类型 类 说明
      class  BaseTask
      The skeleton implementation of task
      类型参数类型为Task的com.owl.downloader.core中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.function.Function<java.io.File,​Task>> Task.fileTaskFactories
      Factories to construct tasks from file, all file task implementations should register here
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.function.Function<java.net.URI,​Task>> Task.uriTaskFactories
      Factories to construct tasks from uri, all uri task implementations should register here
      返回Task的com.owl.downloader.core中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static Task Task.fromFile​(java.io.File file)
      Construct a task from the given file
      static Task Task.fromUri​(java.net.URI uri)
      Construct a task from the given uri
      返回变量类型为Task的类型的com.owl.downloader.core中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      java.util.List<Task> Session.getTasks()
      Get the existing tasks
      参数类型为Task的com.owl.downloader.core中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void Session.insertTask​(Task task)
      Add the given task to session, which means the task get opportunity to be executed
      void Session.removeTask​(Task task)
      Remove the given task from session
